title: VVZ Extension
subtitle: CourseReview in VVZ
text: As switching between CourseReview and VVZ is tedious, we created this extension to make it easier. It shows the reviews for courses directly in VVZ.

title: Teaching Evaluation
subtitle: Those pesky mails you get after every exam
text: Have you ever wondered what LET does with your feedback? Apart from giving it to the lecturers, part of it can be accessed publically. If you are curious about the results, you can find them by following the link bellow.

title: Contribute
subtitle: Get involved :)
text: If you have feature suggestions, found a bug or want to contribute, dont hesitate to contact us. Or go to the projects github repositories directly.
